SEARCH
Package com.litmus7.vehiclerental.dto

Class Vehicle

java.lang.Object
com.litmus7.vehiclerental.dto.Vehicle
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bike, Car
public class Vehicle extends Object
This class represent a vehicle available for rent with its brand, model, rental price per day

      private boolean available
      Rental availability of vehicle. By default any new vehicle created is available for rent.
